review: Cost of doctor is very high it was written rs 700 he takes 900 also rest was ok no issues with doctor

When a patient goes to a doctor, the least he or she expects is for the doctor to be polite, patient and humble.
This doctor does not even know how to be courteous/ humble to seniors. 

A BIG THUMBS DOWN.

If I had an option, I would recommend the Medical fraternity to cancel his practise so it is a lesson for everyone.

We look upon doctors for their professionalism. His behaviour however is extremely upsetting.
